parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To uncover, bring to light, reveal. From apo and kalupto; to take off the cover, i.e. Disclose.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From diakonos; to be an attendant, i.e. Wait upon (figuratively) teacher; technically, to act as a Christian deacon.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: Himself, herself, itself.

parse: Conjunction
str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To bring back word, report; I announce, declare. From ana and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Article - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Adjective - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.

parse: Noun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Wind, breath, spirit.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.

parse: Preposition
str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To long for, covet, lust after, set the heart upon. From epi and thumos; to set the heart upon, i.e. Long for.

parse: Verb - Aorist Infinitive Active
str2: To stoop, peer in, look down, look intently. From para and kupto; to bend beside, i.e. Lean over.

parse: Preposition
str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.
